hero.subtitle: Ukuthenga okulula nokusheshayo. Akukho mafom anxanduva. Fumana impahla yakho ithunyelwe kwivenkile yakho.
hero.communitySupported: Joyina iivenkile ezingaphezu kwe-500 kwindawo yakho

support.defaultMessage: Molo! Ndifuna uncedo nge-odolo yam ye-TOSS.

groupBuying.title: Ukuthenga Ngeqela - Amaxabiso Amantle
groupBuying.description: Joyina nabanye abanini beevenkile kwindawo yakho ukuze nithenga impahla kunye futhi nifumane amaxabiso okuthengisa. Usuku olufanayo lokuhanjiswa kwabonke!

outForDelivery.title: Isendleleni
outForDelivery.description: Umqhubi uzisa impahla yakho kwivenkile yakho

offline.title: Awunanto ye-intanethi
offline.message: Ezinye iimpawu zinokungasebenzi ngaphandle kwe-intanethi. Siza kugcina umsebenzi wakho kwaye sivumelanise xa ubuya kwi-intanethi.
